lead_paragraph: Our young city, which hitherto has escaped the ravages of fire, was last night visited with a terrible conflagration. The fire broke out in a Chinese washhouse on High-street, at about 12 1/4 o'clock. The cause is said to be that a burning candle was left standing by some clothes, and the Chinamen went to sleep.
